name: Clusterfuss (Game Jam Demo)
description:
Pick up your coworkers' paper, remove the clutter and reduce the chaos!

This was made for Mini Jam 100: Overload.

I took the idea of a busy office and made a demo based around the hectic environment. This demo was not at all what I fully wanted to make as I came across time constraints and resolvable issues like a broken navmesh. Initially I wanted the workers to actually move and cause chaos, instead they just drop paper that causes chaos.

Chaos being the limitation, I decided that all the paper would increase a 'chaos' level (the big number above the player), and that the player would have one minute (the smaller number) to 'chaotically' reduce it. Plus the boss throwing treats (which reduces chaos) I thought was chaotically hilarious (overused word much?).

All in all I was more satisfied with the outcome as I built it, having to adapt to design issues and rethink how I was going to build this, It is experimental so do keep that in mind.

Link to Repo:

 https://github.com/Lebyfochs/MiniJam100-Clutterfuss

Thank you for your time and I hope you guys enjoy!
